column2: Your will is law, Divinely impregnate this woman to create a Demi God!
Your beauty is irresistible, Divinely seduce this man to create a Demi God of your own!
Claim yourself as the King of the Gods!
Claim yourself as the King of the Gods!
Become King of the Evil Gods!
Claim yourself as the King of the Evil Gods!
Become Queen of the Evil Gods!
Claim yourself as the Queen of the Evil Gods!
Smite [Root.GetFullName] with divine fury, killing [Root.GetHerHim] instantly.
Channel your divine power to restore [Root.GetFullName], curing [Root.GetHerHim] of illness and physical injury.  But even the power of a God cannot repair a damaged mind...
Bless [Root.GetFullName] with the power of the Gods.
Curse [Root.GetFullName] with the might of your divine displeasure.
Visit [Root.GetFullName] with your divine presence, making [Root.GetHerHim] into a faithful follower!
Send an angelic host to assist [Root.GetFullName] with [Root.GetHersHis] wars.
Strip [Root.GetFullName] of [Root.GetHerHis] divine essence, reducing [Root.GetHerHim] to a mere mortal.
Create a relic imbued with your divine energy.
Fusing Light with Life you have the ability to create Angels when you wish!
Fusing Light with Life you have the ability to create Angels when you wish!
Fusing Darkness with Life you have the ability to create Dark Angels when you wish!
Fusing Darkness with Life you have the ability to create Dark Angels when you wish!
Create the famous Norse Giants of old, a Jotunn!
Create the famous Norse Giants of old, a Jotunn!
Create a beautiful and Evil Goddess
Create a strong Evil God husband.
Create the Kingdom of the Gods
Form an empire-level title and take control of the Good religion.
Form an empire-level title and take control of the Evil religion.
Create the Kingdom of the Evil Gods
